traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Strength score increases by 2, your Constitution score increases by 1, and your Intelligence score is reduced by 2.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Ores reach adulthood at age 12 and live up to 50 years.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Ores are vicious raiders, who believe that the world should be theirs. They also respect strength above all else and believe the strong must bully the weak to ensure that weakness does not spread like a disease. They are usually chaotic evil.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Ores are usually over 6 feet tall and weigh between 230 and 280 pounds. Your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Aggressive
traits.description: As a bonus action, you can move up to your speed toward an enemy of your choice that you can see or hear. You must end this move closer to the enemy than you started.

traits.name: Menacing
traits.description: You are trained in the Intimidation skill.

traits.name: Powerful Build
traits.description: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Common and Orc.
